'''David Michael Scott''' is an Australian actor resident in the Republic of Ireland since 2004. He has extensive theater experience and several on-screen appearances in [[wikipedia:The Tudors|''The Tudors'']].

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he portrayed Lord [[Beric Dondarrion]] in the episode "[[A Golden Crown]]", though his status as a "featured extra" indicated the role was subject to a possible recast in [[Season 3]]. He confirmed he was playing the role via Twitter on November 15, 2010.
